metadata.name: Daria
metadata.description:
Labellecicatrice work done in February 2023 using ink, pencil and watercolor on Fabriano Rosaspina Avorio paper (25 x 35 cm / 285 gsm). 

I met Daria through IG and we decided to exchange drawings. Her work was amazing and I felt indebted to her and recently the possibility arose to draw her again and this is the result.
